info.title: team01-api-Skyfly Express-rest API Swagger Documentation
info.description: Development For Final Project Binar FSW1 Team1 Fullstack Dashboard for a library designed to manage library data and a library website utilizing, Express.js as the backend and Postgress as the Database Management System (DBMS). Github: [TEAM1-API-SKYFLY](https://github.com/orgs/FSW-AND-BINAR-BATCH-6/repositories)
